item.title: Malti Marie is busy with cricket as Priyanka Chopra and Nick Jonas begin Christmas celebrations at LA home. See pics - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Priyanka Chopra and Nick Jonas Kick Off Christmas Celebrations, Featuring Malti Marie

Date: Dec 17, 2024 | Source: Hindustan Times

Priyanka Chopra and Nick Jonas are celebrating Christmas with their daughter, Malti Marie, sharing joyful moments on social media.

  • Priyanka and Nick recently returned to the US from the Red Sea Film Festival in Saudi Arabia.
  • The couple shared festive photos with friends, including decorations and family moments.
  • Malti Marie was seen playing with a cricket bat and enjoying her meal.
  • Fans expressed their love for the family in the comments on Priyanka's post.
  • Priyanka and Nick celebrated their sixth wedding anniversary recently.
“Home (smiling face with hearts emoji).” - Priyanka Chopra

Priyanka is currently filming for the second season of Citadel and has upcoming projects including Heads of State and The Bluff.

item.title: Ram Charan to Perform Mala Visarjanam in Dallas - M9
item.description:
Ram Charan to Perform Malavisarjanam in Dallas

Date: December 21, 2024   Source: M9 News

Telugu star Ram Charan is set to perform MalaVisarjanam at a temple in Dallas, coinciding with his arrival for the pre-release event of his movie Game Changer.

  • Game Changer's pre-release event will be the first of its kind for a top-tier Telugu star in the U.S.
  • The event will take place at the Curtis Culwell Center in Dallas, attracting a large audience.
  • Ram Charan will complete his rituals before appearing at the event.
  • He will return to India after the Dallas event for further engagements, including a significant event in Andhra Pradesh.
  • Other notable attendees will include S. J. Suryah and event anchor Suma.
“Ram Charan, who is currently observing Ayyappa Deeksha, will complete his MalaVisarjanam at a temple in Dallas.”

This event showcases a blend of cultural significance and star power, marking a notable occasion for the Telugu film industry abroad.

item.title: WWE Raw Results – 12/16/24 (Two title matches scheduled, CM Punk responds to Seth “Freakin” Rollins) - Wrestleview.com
item.description:
WWE Raw Results - December 16, 2024

Date: December 16, 2024
Source: Wrestleview

The latest episode of WWE Raw featured two title matches, intense confrontations, and a significant response from CM Punk regarding Seth Rollins.

  • CM Punk addressed Seth Rollins, leading to a chaotic brawl.
  • Bron Breakker defended his WWE Intercontinental Championship against Ludwig Kaiser.
  • Raquel Rodriguez, Zoey Stark, and Kayden Carter competed in a triple threat match for the Women's Intercontinental Championship.
“A really strong opening with Seth Rollins and CM Punk getting into a massive pull-apart brawl…” — Wrestleview.com

Raw ended with anticipation for upcoming matches including Punk vs. Rollins scheduled for January 6, 2025, as WWE moves to Netflix.

item.title: AR Rahman shares he, Zakir Hussain planned an album together: ‘I regret not being able to collaborate with him as much…’ - Hindustan Times
item.description:
AR Rahman Mourns the Loss of Tabla Maestro Zakir Hussain

Date: Dec 17, 2024 | Source: Hindustan Times

AR Rahman paid tribute to the late Ustad Zakir Hussain, a renowned tabla maestro, expressing his grief and regret for not collaborating more during their careers.

  • Rahman shared images with Zakir on Instagram, showcasing his respect and sorrow through emojis.
  • He described Zakir's influence on music as immeasurable and celebrated his contributions to Indian classical music.
  • Rahman revealed plans for a collaborative album with Zakir, lamenting that they did not work together as much as they could have.
  • Zakir Hussain passed away in San Francisco at the age of 73 after battling a chronic lung disease.
  • Prime Minister Narendra Modi also mourned Zakir's death, highlighting his revolutionary impact on Indian classical music.
“Inna lillahi wa inna ilayhi raji'un. Zakir Bhai was an inspiration, a towering personality who elevated the tabla to global acclaim. His loss is immeasurable for all of us.” - AR Rahman

The music community remembers Zakir Hussain as a legend who transcended genres, leaving behind a legacy that will inspire future generations.

item.title: Naga Chaitanya says he tells Sobhita Dhulipala to speak with him in Telugu: ‘Just hearing that same texture…’ - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Naga Chaitanya Encourages Sobhita Dhulipala to Speak Telugu for Connection

Date: Dec 17, 2024
Source: Hindustan Times

Naga Chaitanya, who recently married Sobhita Dhulipala, shares his desire for her to speak to him in Telugu to improve his language skills and connect more deeply.

  • Naga Chaitanya and Sobhita Dhulipala got married on December 4 at Annapurna Studios in Hyderabad.
  • Chaitanya was born in Hyderabad but grew up in Chennai, speaking both Telugu and Tamil.
  • He expressed that speaking Telugu with Sobhita helps him feel a deeper connection.
  • The wedding showcased traditional Telugu customs, with Sobhita wearing a gold Kanjivaram saree.
  • Chaitanya was previously married to Samantha Ruth Prabhu, and they announced their separation in October 2021.
“In our industry we meet a variety of people from different languages. Just hearing that same texture [Telugu] and having that same warmth when you speak to someone- I think it just drew me closer so much faster.” - Naga Chaitanya

This insight highlights the personal connection that language can foster in relationships and reflects the rich cultural heritage shared by the couple.

item.title: 'Pushpa 2' box office collection Day 12 (Updated Live): Allu Arjun and Rashmika Mandanna starrer races to - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Pushpa 2 Box Office Collection Day 12 (Updated Live)

Publication Date: Not specified | Source: Times of India

The film 'Pushpa: The Rule' continues its strong performance at the box office, nearing the Rs 1,500 crore mark despite a recent drop in daily collections.

  • The film earned Rs 27.75 crore on its second Monday.
  • Total net collection stands at Rs 929.85 crore.
  • Exceptional opening week with Rs 725.8 crore and second week adding Rs 204.05 crore.
  • Holds highest grossing second weekend collection record, surpassing 'Stree 2' and 'Gadar 2'.
  • Potential to cross Rs 2,000 crore with upcoming holiday releases.
The film's success has been accompanied by controversy, including the arrest of lead actor Allu Arjun following a fan's death at the premiere, which coincidentally resulted in a significant boost in box office collections.

Overall, 'Pushpa 2' has established itself as a major player in the film industry, showcasing the growth of South Indian cinema on a global stage.

item.title: Pisces Daily Horoscope Today, Dec 17, 2024 predicts nice moments - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Pisces Daily Horoscope Today, December 17, 2024 to know your astrological predictions

Date: Dec 17, 2024
Source: Hindustan Times

Today’s horoscope predicts that Pisces individuals should overcome work challenges through a disciplined attitude and should ensure their love life flourishes free from egos.

  • New professional tasks will keep you busy.
  • Express emotions freely in your love life.
  • Clients are interested in your skills for new projects.
  • Financial prospects are good; consider smart investments.
  • Avoid arguments to maintain control over stress.

“Do not succumb to pressure today.”

This horoscope emphasizes on love, discipline, and financial prudence, helping Pisceans to have a fulfilling day.

item.title: Aquarius Daily Horoscope Today, Dec 17, 2024 predicts facing new challenges - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Aquarius Daily Horoscope Today, Dec 17, 2024 to know your astrological predictions.

Date: Dec 17, 2024

Source: Hindustan Times

Resolve love-related issues and ensure you devote more time to the lover. Settle the professional challenges amiably. Financial issues also exist today.

  • Troubleshoot love issues for happiness.
  • Minor professional issues may arise but can be overcome.
  • Health is good despite some financial challenges.
  • Expect interview calls if job hunting.
  • Be careful while driving; health can improve with diet changes.
“You may expect financial issues today. The returns from previous investments may not be as per your expectations.”

Today’s predictions suggest that Aquarius individuals should focus on resolving love and professional challenges while also keeping an eye on financial management.

item.title: Capricorn Daily Horoscope Today, Dec 17, 2024 predicts launching of new projects - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Capricorn Daily Horoscope Today, December 17, 2024

Date: December 17, 2024

Source: Hindustan Times

This horoscope emphasizes launching new projects and managing challenges in love and career while encouraging Capricorns to strive for balance and communication.

  • Capricorns are advised to resolve relationships issues amicably and handle office challenges prudently.
  • New tasks at work are an opportunity to demonstrate proficiency and creativity.
  • Financial decisions should be approached with caution, especially involving partners and new business ventures.
  • Health is generally good, but maintaining a balanced lifestyle is crucial.
  • Minor turbulence in relationships may require diplomatic handling.

“Expect minor turbulence in the relationship. Long-distance love affairs need more communication.”

In conclusion, today’s horoscope suggests a focus on launching projects while managing interpersonal relationships with care.

item.title: Sagittarius Daily Horoscope Today, Dec 17, 2024 predicts a better package - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Sagittarius Daily Horoscope Today, December 17, 2024

Date: December 17, 2024 | Source: Hindustan Times

The daily horoscope for Sagittarius indicates a promising love life and opportunities in professional and financial sectors today. Emphasis is placed on communication and teamwork in personal relationships.

  • A pleasant love life awaits Sagittarius individuals today.
  • Overcoming personal issues can lead to positive results in both personal and professional areas.
  • Career prospects appear bright, with potential job switches for better packages.
  • Financial opportunities will emerge, particularly in the second half of the day.
  • Health is generally good, but mindfulness about diet and exercise is recommended.
“Do not let risks down you.”

Digging deeper into today’s horoscope suggests a focus on teamwork and open communication in relationships. Financial handling is advised to be prudent, with potential investments in property or jewelry.

item.title: Scorpio Daily Horoscope Today, Dec 17, 2024 predicts new tasks at the office - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Scorpio Daily Horoscope Today, December 17, 2024

Date: December 17, 2024 | Source: Hindustan Times

Today, Scorpio individuals are encouraged to tackle new tasks at the office that will aid in career growth. Financial stability is anticipated, and attention should be given to health as well.

  • Handle pressure confidently at work.
  • Valuable moments in love are forecasted; resolve past issues with partners.
  • Career opportunities arise, seniors may recognize your performance positively.
  • No major financial disruptions; consider purchases and investments wisely.
  • Health is stable, but those with specific conditions should take precautions.
“Take up new tasks at the office which will help you grow in your career.”

In conclusion, today is a promising day for Scorpios characterized by professional growth and enhanced personal relationships.

item.title: Libra Daily Horoscope Today, Dec 17, 2024 predicts good returns - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Libra Daily Horoscope Today, December 17, 2024

The Libra Daily Horoscope for today emphasizes patience and romance in love, while also encouraging financial and career growth.

  • Love life requires patience and communication.

  • No major financial issues; expect good returns.

“Nothing can stop your triumph.”

This horoscope encourages balancing love and work while being attentive to health.

item.description:
Virgo Daily Horoscope Today, December 17, 2024

Date: December 17, 2024 | Source: Hindustan Times

Today's horoscope indicates that Virgos should focus on love and work relationships while managing minor ego-related issues. Financial opportunities are favorable, and maintaining good health is encouraged.

  • Be open to new opportunities and handle responsibilities positively.
  • Financial prosperity is present; debts can be repaid, and plans for travel may be made.
  • Health issues are minimal but caution is advised in slippery conditions.

"No major monetary issue will trouble you. Health is also good."

Concluding, today's horoscope emphasizes balance in personal and professional aspects while seizing financial and relational opportunities.

item.description:
Leo Daily Horoscope Today, December 17, 2024

  • Financial management is encouraged; pay off debts.
  • Be cautious in a relationship as there may be minor rifts.
  • Career growth is highlighted with potential for foreign assignments.
  • Health issues may arise, particularly related to vision and skin.
“Rough sea makes good sailors.”

In conclusion, maintain focus on quality in all aspects of life to achieve success and harmony today.

item.description:
Cancer Daily Horoscope Today, December 17, 2024

Today presents a great opportunity for Cancers to foster their relationships while also focusing on personal and financial growth.

item.description:
Gemini Daily Horoscope Today, December 17, 2024

Date: Dec 17, 2024

Source: Hindustan Times

The daily horoscope for Gemini on December 17, 2024, advises individuals to maintain harmony in relationships and avoid egos. New professional opportunities are on the horizon, particularly in terms of career and finances.

  • Strong focus on love and relationships; avoid unpleasant discussions.

  • Financial planning is essential; a possible need for funds related to education or travel.

“Do not let egos hamper the life.”

Overall, Gemini natives are encouraged to maintain a diplomatic approach in personal and professional settings while taking care of their health.

item.description:
Taurus Daily Horoscope Today, December 17, 2024 to know your astrological predictions. Settle the relationship issues on a positive note.

Handle every issue associated with love with care. Today presents an opportunity to settle relationship challenges positively and professionally, while health remains favorable.

  • Relationship issues should be managed with sincerity and care.
  • Opportunities for new partnerships in business may arise.
  • While at work, stay away from office gossip to maintain good relations with management.

“Be sincere in the relationship. There can be minor tremors and it is crucial you handle them with care.”

item.title: Horoscope Today, December 17, 2024: Check astrological prediction for Gemini, Scorpio and other signs - The Indian Express
item.description:
Horoscope Today, December 17, 2024: Check astrological prediction for Gemini, Scorpio and other signs

Date: December 17, 2024

Source: Astrological Insights

Today's horoscope offers guidance across the zodiac, emphasizing themes of forgiveness, opportunity, and self-reflection.

  • Aries: Back-tracking in professional affairs is necessary, but ultimately rewarding.
  • Taurus: Ideal opportunity to prove your perceptiveness and nurturing qualities.
  • Gemini: A perfect time for forgiveness, regardless of external tensions.
  • Cancer: Reflect on emotional issues; starting from the end may provide clarity.
  • Leo: Stick to tried-and-tested methods to gain respect from peers.
  • Virgo: Focus on moral and ethical actions for personal growth.
  • Libra: Preserve important relationships to enhance your financial situation.
  • Scorpio: Explore different life options with support from partners.
  • Sagittarius: Maintain perspective to navigate life’s challenges successfully.
  • Capricorn: Reorganize your approach to family and personal desires.
  • Aquarius: Address home issues while creating a positive future.
  • Pisces: Embrace the positivity Venus brings and lift your spirits.
“It is undoubtedly a perfect time for forgiveness, even if others are going all out for revenge.” - Gemini Horoscope

This horoscope encourages self-improvement and reflection, suggesting that each sign can find opportunities for growth and understanding.

item.title: Sonakshi Sinha Slams Mukesh Khanna For 'Distasteful' Comment On Her Upbringing: 'Next Time You...' - News18
item.description:
Sonakshi Sinha Slams Mukesh Khanna For 'Distasteful' Comment On Her Upbringing: 'Next Time You...'

Date: December 17, 2024

Source: News18

Sonakshi Sinha has sharply criticized Mukesh Khanna after his comments regarding her upbringing linked to her performance on Kaun Banega Crorepati (KBC). Khanna's remarks have drawn backlash, prompting a thoughtful response from Sinha.

  • Sonakshi Sinha feels Mukesh Khanna's comments were 'distasteful' and disrespectful.
  • Khanna blamed her father, Shatrughan Sinha, for her incorrect answer on a KBC episode.
  • Sonakshi pointed out that two other contestants also missed the answer, not just her.
  • She emphasized that her mistake was a simple human error and drew parallels to the forgiving nature of Lord Ram.
  • Sonakshi expressed disappointment over Khanna seeking attention by bringing up her past mistake.
“Firstly, let me remind you there were two women on the hot seat that day who did not know the answer to the same question...”

In conclusion, Sonakshi reminded Khanna of the values her father instilled in her and expressed hope for more respectful discourse in the future.

item.title: Sonakshi Sinha slams Mukesh Khanna for his remarks on her father Shatrughan Sinha and her upbringing: 'Th - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Sonakshi Sinha slams Mukesh Khanna for his remarks on her father Shatrughan Sinha and her upbringing: 'The next time you decide to comment on the values...'

Date: Latest News | Source: Times of India

Sonakshi Sinha has openly criticized actor Mukesh Khanna for negative comments he made regarding her father, Shatrughan Sinha, and her upbringing. She emphasized the importance of respecting family values and called for a respectful dialogue.

"The next time you decide to comment on the values, maybe take a look at your own."
  • Sonakshi firmly defends her father, highlighting his values and contributions.
  • The actress advocates for respectful discussions regarding public figures and their families.
  • Mukesh Khanna's statements are seen as controversial and inappropriate.

The incident has sparked discussions about familial respect in the entertainment industry and the role of public influencers in shaping dialogue.

item.title: Vivian Dsena's wife Nouran Aly reacts on calling Karan Veer Mehra 'junior artist': 'Mujhe farak..' - India Forums
item.description:
Nouran Aly Defends Vivian Dsena Against Karan Veer Mehra's Remarks on Bigg Boss 18

Published: Monday, June 15, 1446 at 8:42 AM | Source: India Forums

Nouran Aly, wife of television actor Vivian Dsena, made headlines after her recent appearance on Bigg Boss 18, where she addressed the controversy surrounding remarks made by Karan Veer Mehra.

  • Karan Veer Mehra allegedly called Vivian a "junior artist" and said he invited him to parties to fill space.
  • Nouran clarified her stance on social media, stating that her words were manipulated and emphasized her indifference to hate comments.
  • She stated, "Who called the other junior artist? Manipulating or twisting my statement won't work on me. Hate comments and fake narratives don't affect me—mujhe fark nahi padta."
  • Her bold defense has rallied support from fans, reinforcing Vivian's position in the show.

Fans are excitedly labeling this as Vivian's "comeback era" on the show, anticipating his potential victory in Bigg Boss 18.

item.title: Why SC restrained TM Krishna from claiming award named after MS Subbulakshmi. 'Added fuel to fire' - ThePrint
item.description:
Supreme Court Prevents T.M. Krishna from Claiming M.S. Subbulakshmi Award

Publication Date: Date Not Specified Source: The Print

Well-known Carnatic musician T.M. Krishna has been restrained by the Supreme Court from claiming the Sangita Kalanidhi M.S. Subbulakshmi Award, awarded by the Madras Music Academy, following an appeal by Subbulakshmi’s grandson.

  • The Supreme Court issued a notice regarding the award conferred upon Krishna.
  • Subbulakshmi’s grandson, V. Shrinivasan, challenged the Madras High Court's decision that allowed the award to be given.
  • The Supreme Court indicated that Krishna's comments about Subbulakshmi were disrespectful and necessary to address.
  • Krishna faces accusations of making derogatory remarks about Subbulakshmi in his writings.
“This is a sensitive and important issue.” - Supreme Court Bench

The controversy highlights a broader conflict regarding the recognition and memory of M.S. Subbulakshmi in the field of Carnatic music.

item.title: Sonakshi Sinha calls out Mukesh Khanna for questioning her upbringing and blaming her father Shatrughan Sinha; 'next time you decide to say anything…’ - PINKVILLA
item.description:
Sonakshi Sinha Calls Out Mukesh Khanna for Blaming Her Upbringing

Publication Date: December 17, 2024
Source: Pinkvilla

In a recent incident, actress Sonakshi Sinha responded to actor Mukesh Khanna, who criticized her knowledge of the Ramayana, attributing it to her upbringing and her father's influence.

  • Khanna questioned why Sinha could not answer a question about the Ramayana on the quiz show KBC.
  • Sonakshi defended herself, highlighting that two other women present also could not answer.
  • She reminded Khanna of the values instilled in her by her father, Shatrughan Sinha.
  • Sinha emphasized the importance of forgiveness and requested Khanna to stop criticizing her family.
“The next time you decide to say anything about the values my father has instilled in me... please remember it's because of those values that I have only said what I said, very respectfully.”

This episode highlights the ongoing discussions around knowledge of cultural epics and the influence of upbringing on public figures.

item.title: 'True Genius': PM Modi Condoles Zakir Hussain's Death, Hails His Contribution to Global Music - News18
item.description:
PM Modi Condoles the Death of Tabla Maestro Zakir Hussain

Date: December 16, 2024

Source: News18

Prime Minister Narendra Modi expressed his condolences following the passing of Ustad Zakir Hussain, a legendary tabla maestro who passed away at the age of 73 in San Francisco. PM Modi praised Hussain’s contributions to Indian classical music and cultural unity.

  • Hussain died from complications related to idiopathic pulmonary fibrosis.
  • Regarded as one of the greatest tabla players, he captivated millions globally.
  • PM Modi highlighted Hussain's role in blending Indian classical traditions with global music.
  • Hussain is survived by his wife and daughters.
Deeply saddened by the passing of the legendary tabla maestro, Ustad Zakir Hussain Ji. He will be remembered as a true genius who revolutionized the world of Indian classical music. — Narendra Modi (@narendramodi) December 16, 2024

This loss is felt deeply within the music community and among music lovers around the world.

item.title: Nicole Kidman reveals her mother's ‘final words’ to her, ‘I didn't know…’ - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Nicole Kidman reveals her mother's advice changed her perspective on life

Date: Dec 16, 2024 | Source: Hindustan Times

Nicole Kidman recently opened up about her mother's “final words” to her following the passing of her mother, Janelle Ann Kidman. She shared how those words significantly impacted her outlook on life during a CBS morning interview.

  • Kidman had received the news of her mother's death during the Venice Film Festival.
  • Her mother's last advice urged her to take care of herself, prompting Kidman to reflect on self-care for women.
  • As a mother of four, Kidman emphasizes the importance of self-care for the wellbeing of her children.
“The final words my mama said, which I didn’t know were gonna be the final words…”

Kidman is now committed to ensuring that both she and other women prioritize their well-being.
